pullrequest.title: Add filter by IP option to traffic shaper

content.raw:
If using the FC as iperf server I get this (results printed in OCU terminal):
```
------------------------------------------------------------
Client connecting to 192.168.2.10, TCP port 5001
TCP window size: 45.0 KByte (default)
------------------------------------------------------------
[  3] local 192.168.2.150 port 58390 connected with 192.168.2.10 port 5001
[ ID] Interval       Transfer     Bandwidth
[  3]  0.0-374.0 sec   256 KBytes  5.61 Kbits/sec
```
